name: Do Not Believe His Lies: The Unforgiving Riddle
name_original: Do Not Believe His Lies: The Unforgiving Riddle
description:
Only the Weak Give Up. It always seems impossible, until it's done!

Official release of "Do Not Believe His Lies" the unforgiving riddle for iOS. Support Us.

P.S. No one said it was easy.
